data.name: Szott's Roofing
data.address: 2701 Little Elm Pkwy Ste 100-431, Little Elm, TX 75068

reviews.text: 2701 Little Elm Pkwy Ste 100-431, Little Elm, TX 75068 Located in: Little Elm Market Place

Providence Village roof replacement. This project started with a few missing shingles and homeowner was experiencing a small leak, upon inspection we tarped the area and homeowner filed the claim. We are doing a full Owens Corning Total Protection roof system, seamless aluminum gutter system, Sherwin Williams exterior paint, vinyl fencing, interior drywall and interior paint. www. szotts.com #littleelmtx #szottsroofs #szottsroofing #littleelmtexas #owenscorning #sherwinwilliamspaint #stormdamage
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Their price will beat anyone and they were easy to work with." "Highly recommend their service for peace of mind." "Szott's is an honest, customer satisfaction centered company."

Szotts Roofing was able to make this new roof happen  in Greenville Tx. The crew was polite, efficient, and left NO mess. The entire project took less than 5 hours. Curtis and Lori (the owners of Szotts Roofing) walked us thru the entire … More Response from the owner 6 months ago

Szott's Roofing did an exceptional job, not just with the roof, gutter and skylight installation, but also in helping me navigate the insurance process. They provided clear evidence and detailed documentation of the storm damage to both the … More Response from the owner 5 months ago Thank you for the review Marlene we really appreciate it.  Glad we could help in documenting and proving the hail damages to your property in Carrollton TX

Szottz’s roofing completed my roof, gutters, screens and fence with quality craftsmanship and the product looks fantastic. With that said, I absolutely love how the pergola and fence now look after being stained =) More Response from the owner 4 months ago Thank you for trusting us with your storm damage restoration.
